dmca.title: One Parent Family DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
[Private]

FACSIMILE TRANSMITTAL SHEET

TO:		[Private]

FROM:		[Private]

COMPANY:	Google, Inc

DATE:		07/03/2003

FAX NUMBER: 	[Private]

TOTAL No. OF PAGES INCLUDING COVER: 3

PHONE NUMBER:	

SENDER'S REFERENCE NUMBER:

RE: DMCA Complaint

YOUR REFERENCE NUMBER:

URGENT	FOR REVIEW	PLEASE COMMENT	X PLEASE REPLY	PLEASE RECYCLE

NOTES/COMMENTS:

Please review the following DMCA complaint against the website(s) stated in the document.  
Any questions can be forward to me at [Private] or by email at [Private]

[Private]


[Private] 
CALGARY, AB T2J4S3




1. The following URL's are stealing my content/code/graphics: 
(all of these redirected to the same site)
OneParentFamily.com, 
OneParentFamily.co.uk, 
SingleParentsWorld.co.uk, 
OneParentDad.co.uk, 
SingleParentsClub.org 

Proof of the stolen material are as follows: 

http://www.oneparentfamily.com/images/home1.html 

this url uses my text as follows:

"Think dating is hard?...try dating as a single parent!  Once you 
convince someone that having children is not equal to having the 
plague, then single parents have to deal with all the issues that come
up."

As seen at: http://www.parentsworld.com/

Where the EXACT text as above can be seen on the front page, as follows:

"Think dating is hard?...try dating as a single parent! once you 
convince someone that having children is not equal to having the 
plague, then single parents have to deal with all the issues that come 
up."

WORD FOR WORD, including the "..." it's the same.

If [Private] of One Parent Family were to try and claim this text to
Be his own, my use of this EXACT text can be found at the Way Back
Machine as far back as January 18, 2000. This is publicly viewable at:

http://web.archive.org/web/20000118153302/http://parentsworld.com/index.html

Also, on November 25, 2001, a demand was sent to [Private] to remove 
my logo from his website as he was using it as his own without permission.

[Private] claimed it was a misunderstanding and promised to remove 
it. Todate (sic), the logo remains at:

http://www.oneparentfamily.com/images/header.jpg and at
http://www.omeparentfamily.com/images/leave4ww.bmp but with this
second example, he's added HIS URL to MY logo.

This has been my logo since late 1999 as seen at my site 
http://www.parentsworld.com/images/header.jpg and as seen in use on the 
Way Back Machine at
http://web.archive.org/web/20000118153302/http://parentsworld.com/index.html
and can be seen still in use at my original URL at
http://www.nucleus.com/~jlassali

After two weeks of demand notices, he HAS removed SOME of the offending 
materials, but not all.  As shown with the logo, often the material is
removed only to be put back up at a later date.  A timeline of the 
copyright infringements that keep occurring over the years and screen
shots of materials stolen can be viewed at
http://www.parentsworld.com/stolen.html

2.

Search Query: "single parents"
Infringing Web Pages: www.oneparentfamily.co.uk/

Search Query: "one parent family"
Infringing Web Pages: www.oneparentfamily.co.uk/

Search Query: "single parents world"
Infringing Web Pages: www.oneparentfamily.co.uk/ ,
www.singleparentsworld.co.uk ,

Search Query: "single parents information"
Infringing Web Pages: www.oneparentfamily.co.uk/links.html

Search Query: "single parent dating"
Infringing Web Pages: www.oneparentfamily.org/

Search Query: "single parent support"
Infringing Web Pages: www.oneparentfamily.co.uk/support page.html

3. I can be reached by email at [Private]

4. As registered website owner, my contact is as follows:
	[Private]
	Calgary, AB T2J 4S3
	Canada
	[Private]

5. 1 have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner 
complained of is not authorized by the copyright (myself), its agent, 
or the law.

6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner 
(myself)of (sic) the infringed materials.

7. The Following Complaint is Signed by:



[Private]
